title: Not receiving password recovery
body: I am attempting to get my old LoL account back up and running which had more characters (Ryazer24/Razor244) but am not getting the email to recover lost passwords.  I have checked spam, checked other folders, checked deleted files. I merely am not retrieving them.  Help?

replies.body: If you're having trouble recovering your account, just hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account team can make sure it's being sent to the right email and get your info updated.  See you there!
